embed.description: International Elo Ratings The story of this week is the return of EDG who won the offline portion of the Demacia Cup with an incredible...

replies.body:
the 1st and 2nd team on that ladder is on a completely different level of game play / team strategy than the rest teams on that ladder.

hope there are some surprises in the S5 world championships

Likewise, i think EU is going to really show up and play well.

NA i'm concerned with tbh, their passive playstyle is really costing them.
